item.content:encoded:
The Annual FACT Dining Awards celebrates the best of GCC’s culinary scene. FACT Magazine has become the dining authority in Doha, celebrating the leaders of the industry.

All winners were awarded based on both public votes and critique opinions and received their accolades amongst their peers. There were two awards in key categories; Favourite awards were decided by the public through an online voting system, whereas the Best awards were decided by FACT’s editorial panel.

We are proud to announce, Sasso has been awarded the most Favourite Italian Fine Dining Restaurant in Doha 2022 by the FACT Magazine Doha. We promise to continue raising the standards for authentic gourmet food served to you with passion.

We would like to thank everyone for your support! We would also like to thank our team for their incredible effort.

item.content:encoded:
We pride ourselves on following traditional Italian cuisine; whilst adding our flare take.

A pasta dish is only as good as its ingredients. That’s why we import our spices and use top-quality ingredients in each of our dishes, especially our newly created Spicy Rigatoni Burrata – A New & Exclusive Doha’s Favourite Dish.

Sasso presents the exclusive dish in Doha; The Spicy Rigatoni Burrata – a spicy twist on a classic pasta dish with fresh onions and garlic, slathered in a rich pink sauce, and topped with premium quality creamy burrata flown directly from Italy to perfectly balance out the kick – ideal for a meatless meal!
